question:
[Chuck] was so excited to surprise his son, [Leandro], with the tickets to the playoffs. [Judy] and her sister, [Maxine], went to church. [Maxine]'s mom, [Carmelita], was sick, and could n't make it, and [Maxine] told the pastor so he would pray for a speedy recovery. [Mickey] was playing checkers with his brother [Leandro]. [Mickey]'s sister [Naomi] was waiting to play. [Carmelita] and her son [Spencer] went to pick up his brother [Chuck] from school.
Question: How is [Judy] related to [Naomi]?

- [Maxine] is the sister of [Judy]
- [Carmelita] is the mother of [Maxine] and [Spencer]
- [Mickey] is the brother of [Leandro] and [Naomi]
- [Naomi] is the sister of [Mickey]
- [Spencer] is the son of [Carmelita] and the brother of [Chuck]

Step 3: Analyze the relationships to determine the relationship between [Judy] and [Naomi]:
- [Judy] is the sister of [Maxine]
- [Maxine] is the sister of [Naomi]
- Therefore, [Judy] is the aunt of [Naomi]

Step 4: Provide the inferred relationship between [Judy] and [Naomi]:
Based on the information provided, [Judy] is the aunt of [Naomi].
